headline: Barclays Updates Price Target for Duke Energy (DUK)
summary: Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) is included among the 12 Best Nuclear Power Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) engages in the distribution of natural gas and energy-related services. The company operates 11 nuclear units at six sites in the Carolinas, representing the company’s largest and most reliable source of carbon-free generation. Duke […]

headline: Duke Energy Foundation offers $500,000 in grants to support North Carolina small businesses
summary: Duke Energy Foundation today announced a new grant opportunity, offering $500,000 to support small businesses in communities across North Carolina.
